Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: Great selection of beers, nice atmosphere and service.

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: Great little brown cafe with one of the best beer selections in town. Very friendly staff and cozy atmosphere where you can mingle equally with regulars, locals, expats and beer tourists. They also offer a really nice range of after dinner snacks to go with the beers.

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: Great service and knowledgeable staff, combined with good food.

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: Whether you‚Äôre looking for a spot to sip on a beer, catch up with friends over drinks, or grab a bite, this is your spot! Very welcoming staff, that gave me a suggestion for a sour ale! I ordered the best Portuguese style fish fritters!

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: Best place in Amsterdam. Great food and beers. Nice staff. Fun. Cozy. Worth a trip.

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: Love this place. great beer from the tap and also great food and apertizers

Review Text:

the beer sections was really well balanced with offerings of just about every ‚Ä¶

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: Nice place with a very good selection of beers. A little closer to the road and felt a little crowded were three main downsides.

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: Great bar full of locals and they are so friendly to us even though we are expats who don‚Äôt speak Dutch. Large beer selection and surprisingly good food.

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: Place the locals go to for a huge variety of beer. The 24 plaques with beer names and breweries chalked on them are small batches of draft beer. It's always a surprise what's on the wall. ‚Ä¶

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: Hands down the best stop over for lovers of exclusive beers (can we all stop calling it "craft" beer by now? Thanks). 24 beers from tap, and a regularly changing menu. You will not find too many Belgian beers here. The food is on point, ‚Ä¶

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: Great bruin local bar, with very good/friendly service and a great mix of customers (older regulars with a young crowd). Very good selection of beers. Food is not great, but mostly people go there to drink.

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: Great beer. Nice place, friendly staff & good snacks.

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: For Amsterdam the food is above average, but I'm not from Amsterdam. The beer selection is excellent, many locals, Belgians, American. Small place. Service is ...s l o w... but friendly. Nice tables outside, inside, and "winter garden". Overall a positive experience!

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: What a great watering hole. The waitress is great, the beer is cold, and the tacos are great.

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: Good beers, friendly staff that can talk about what's on tap.  I always try to stop by here when in town.  Also a nice easy walk from the RAI if you're here for a convention.

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text:
A very informal place for having a drink.

It gives me a feeling of being in Cafe friends. ‚Ä¶

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: Very nice little beer bar in De Pijp, great selection and reasonably priced.  This place will keep you away from the "tourist" crowd and make you feel right at home

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: Tasty fish and chips and crisp beers. Also lovely staff, always a great time there.

Name: Dopey's Elixer
Review Text: Friendly Staff and nice place to delight some of their 22 beers in tap.

Name: Dopey's Elixer

Name: Dopey's Elixer

Name: Dopey's Elixer
